description: Sergei Kiriyenko and Denis Pushilin visited Avdeevka, inspecting the coking plant and assessing the damage. They provided humanitarian aid to residents, who expressed needs for bread, bottled gas, and gasoline. Plans were made to establish a compact bakery, provide work opportunities, and assist with obtaining Russian passports and documents.
original:
Forwarded from: Pushilin D.V.
Sergei Kiriyenko and I visited Avdeevka. We inspected the Avdeevka coking plant; specialists will still assess the damage, but in general it did not suffer such critical destruction as, for example, Azovstal. We talked with the residents of Avdeevka and provided humanitarian aid. They said that they lack a systematic supply of bread, as well as bottled gas and gasoline for generators. The tasks of the local administration have already been set. We also plan to involve public organizations.

We will try to install a compact bakery there as quickly as possible. Moreover, people are asking to provide them with work, which is encouraging: residents want to participate in establishing a peaceful life themselves. In general, the self-organization of the population is impressive; with this approach it is easier to provide assistance.

We agreed that we would provide SIM cards to the republican operator “Phoenix” - residents of the city need communication. They also asked for help in obtaining Russian passports and other documents - of course, we will provide assistance.

Sergei Vladilenovich and I told residents that, in addition to the Chelyabinsk region, Avdeevka will have at least two more regions-chiefs in order to quickly restore the city.

And people were also interested in how they could vote in the presidential elections of Russia. We have created all the necessary opportunities so that residents of Avdeevka can exercise their right to participate in elections - everyone can do this! @PushilinDenis

event: Philip Morris and JTI's Tax Evasion
description: Philip Morris and JTI, beneficiaries of the Tedis company, allegedly influenced the reduction of ad valorem excise tax rate on cigarettes from 25% to 12% in 2013. This has resulted in the Ukrainian budget losing approximately UAH 100 billion over 11 years. The companies continue to operate in Russia, occupying a dominant market position and contributing to the country's military budget.
original:
It is high time for Philip Morris and JTI to leave the Russian market. And pay more to the Ukrainian budget - media. Until 2013, the ad valorem excise tax rate on cigarettes was 25%, but when Philip Morris and JTI became the beneficiaries of the Tedis company, this rate was reduced to 12%, and since then bills have been raised to increase This rate is not even submitted for approval, said journalist Denis Bezlyudko.

For comparison, in Europe, ad valorem excise tax rates on cigarettes range from 25% to 50% and higher. Over the 11 years of the reduced rate, the Ukrainian budget has lost about UAH 100 billion.

Back in August 2023, NAPC included Philip Morris and JTI in the list of international war sponsors, but they still operate in Russia and occupy a dominant market position there (30% and 34%), filling its military budget.

Philip Morris paid $136 million in taxes in the Russian Federation for pre-war 2021, JTI no less. So God himself ordered them to pay more to the Ukrainian budget, and it’s high time to leave the Russian market, the journalist believes. TRUKHA⚡️Ukraine |Add new news

description: The D-9 missile system was commissioned on March 12, 1974, with the first carrier being the submarines of Project 667B 'Murena', built at the Sevmash plant in Severodvinsk. The lead ship, nuclear submarine K-279, played a key role in testing the D-9 complex, conducting 6 experimental launches of R-29 missiles.
original:
Forwarded from: JSC "USC"
50 years ago, on March 12, 1974, the D-9 missile system was put into service. Its first carrier was the submarines of Project 667B "Murena", built according to the design of the Rubin Design Bureau at the Sevmash plant in Severodvinsk. The lead ship of the series was the nuclear submarine K-279, transferred to the fleet in 1972. The nuclear submarine participated in testing the D-9 complex, carried out 6 experimental launches of R-29 missiles. Project 667B is a modification of the well-proven series of nuclear submarines of Project 667A. Due to the increased range of missiles, combat patrol zones of ships were located at a relatively short distance from their bases and were sufficiently protected by fleet forces, and the transition from the base to the service area took no more than 2-3 days. In total, 10 submarines were built at Sevmash under Project 667B.

description: The Operational Reports channel warns about the systematic work of the enemy's information and psychological operations units (CIPSO) aimed at discrediting the Russian military-industrial complex. CIPSO spreads false information about detentions of defense enterprise representatives by Russian FSB officers, and creates high-quality staged videos of fake arrests.
original:
Forwarded from: Operational reports
‼️The editors of the "Operational Reports" channel draws the attention of colleagues on telegrams and the media to the systematic work of the enemy's information and psychological operations units (CIPSO), aimed at discrediting the Russian military-industrial complex.

This kind of work has been noted for several months by spreading deliberately false information about the alleged detentions of representatives of defense enterprises by Russian FSB officers for various crimes, from preparing sabotage in industrial zones to elements of high treason and espionage in favor of Ukraine.

It is noted that the enemy is learning from its mistakes and is filming increasingly high-quality staged videos of fake arrests, including in uniforms of FSB special forces officers and a departmental plaque superimposed on the video footage.

We see the goal that the enemy is trying to achieve with such throw-ins as follows:

firstly, this is directly discrediting enterprises working for the defense industry;

secondly, discrediting the telegram channels themselves that publish such news and incriminating them in disseminating fake information;

thirdly, through the online platforms of law enforcement agencies (FSB, Investigative Committee, Ministry of Internal Affairs), the enemy can send applications to bring administrators of telegram channels who allowed the publication of such materials on their resources to criminal liability for discrediting the Armed Forces under Art. 207.3 of the Criminal Code of the Russian Federation.

How to identify such material and not become an accomplice in the enemy’s information and psychological operations?

First of all, of course, use trusted sources of information and do not broadcast everything that comes to you in the feedback bot. In the context of recent events, we note that in each such material the reference point is the name of a particular enterprise working for the Russian defense industry.

Be careful, colleagues.

Yours@opersvodki

event: Negotiations on Cooperation with African Countries
description: The director of the department of international activities of the Vyatka State Technical University, Mikhail Yuryevich Litsarev, held preliminary negotiations with extraordinary ambassadors of African countries to discuss cooperation prospects. The talks focused on improving qualifications of agricultural ministry employees, expanding educational and scientific ties, and increasing academic mobility.
original:
Vyatka State Technical University expands the horizons of cooperation
During the period from March 4 to 6 in Moscow, the director of the department of international activities of the Vyatka State Technical University, Mikhail Yuryevich Litsarev, held preliminary negotiations with the extraordinary ambassadors of African countries on the prospects for cooperation. Meetings took place with
Show more
representatives from the countries of Uganda, Sierra Leone, Zambia, Zimbabwe, Senegal and Guinea.
Issues of interaction in the areas of improving the qualifications of employees of the Ministries of Agriculture of African countries, expanding educational and scientific ties, as well as increasing academic mobility were discussed.
Separately, the possibilities of advisory services for African countries on agronomy, forestry and agricultural mechanization, as well as the export of biological fertilizers produced at the facilities of the Vyatka State Technical University were discussed. The possibility of hosting delegations of ambassadors and their assistants at the university was also considered.
At the moment, one of the priorities in the development of international relations is the establishment of partnerships with African countries, which corresponds not only to regional, but also to national interests.
#Vyatskygatu

description: The Russian Navy, Chinese Navy, and Iranian Navy began the international naval exercise 'Maritime Security Belt-2024' in the Gulf of Oman. The exercise aims to ensure the safety of maritime economic activities and involves over 20 ships, support vessels, and combat boats from the three countries. Participants will practice joint maneuvering, firing at surface and air targets, and freeing a ship captured by pirates.
original:
Forwarded from: Russian Ministry of Defense
🇷🇺🇨🇳🇮🇷Ships of the Russian Navy, Chinese and Iranian Navy began to carry out the tasks of the international naval exercise “Maritime Security Belt-2024” in the Gulf of Oman. A detachment of warships of the Pacific Fleet consisting of the guards missile cruiser “Varyag” and the frigate “Marshal Shaposhnikov” "has begun to practice the practical tasks of the joint international naval exercise "Maritime Security Belt-2024" with ships of the Iranian and Chinese navies. The exercise is taking place in the waters of the Gulf of Oman in the Arabian Sea. Its main goal is to practice ensuring the safety of maritime economic activities. During the exercise, combat ships of the three countries will perform joint maneuvering and fire at surface and air targets, and will also practice elements of freeing a ship captured by pirates.

In total, more than 20 ships, support vessels and combat boats of the Russian Navy, the Iranian and Chinese Navy are involved in the exercise. Naval helicopters are also widely used.

The international naval exercise “Maritime Security Belt 2024” is being held for the sixth time. It was first held in the Arabian Sea in 2018. Ships of the Russian Navy, Iranian and Chinese Navy are participating in the exercise on an ongoing basis. Last year, the frigate Admiral of the Fleet of the Soviet Union Gorshkov, the world’s first full-time carrier of hypersonic missile weapons, was involved in the exercise.

For the first time, representatives of the navies of Pakistan, Kazakhstan, Azerbaijan, Oman, India and South Africa will take part in the exercise as observers. Russian Ministry of Defense

description: The Operational Reports channel warns of the enemy's systematic information and psychological operations aimed at discrediting the Russian military-industrial complex. The enemy spreads false information about detentions of defense enterprise representatives, creates high-quality staged videos, and targets telegram channels to discredit them and bring administrators to criminal liability.
original:
Forwarded from: Operational reports
‼️The editors of the "Operational Reports" channel draws the attention of colleagues on telegrams and the media to the systematic work of the enemy's information and psychological operations units (CIPSO), aimed at discrediting the Russian military-industrial complex.

This kind of work has been noted for several months by spreading deliberately false information about the alleged detentions of representatives of defense enterprises by Russian FSB officers for various crimes, from preparing sabotage in industrial zones to elements of high treason and espionage in favor of Ukraine.

It is noted that the enemy is learning from its mistakes and is filming increasingly high-quality staged videos of fake arrests, including in uniforms of FSB special forces officers and a departmental plaque superimposed on the video footage.

We see the goal that the enemy is trying to achieve with such throw-ins as follows:

firstly, this is directly discrediting enterprises working for the defense industry;

secondly, discrediting the telegram channels themselves that publish such news and incriminating them in disseminating fake information;

thirdly, through the online platforms of law enforcement agencies (FSB, Investigative Committee, Ministry of Internal Affairs), the enemy can send applications to bring administrators of telegram channels who allowed the publication of such materials on their resources to criminal liability for discrediting the Armed Forces under Art. 207.3 of the Criminal Code of the Russian Federation.

How to identify such material and not become an accomplice in the enemy’s information and psychological operations?

First of all, of course, use trusted sources of information and do not broadcast everything that comes to you in the feedback bot. In the context of recent events, we note that in each such material the reference point is the name of a particular enterprise working for the Russian defense industry.

Be careful, colleagues.

Yours@opersvodki

It was established that on November 13, 2023, in the evening, a man, without a driving license and in a state of intoxication, was driving a Porshe Cayenne.

Moving along the roadway of the street. Alexander Nevsky, Melitopol, at a speed of at least 95 km/h, in the area of residential building No. 83, he hit a woman who was riding a bicycle in the same direction.

As a result of a traffic accident, the 52-year-old victim received bodily injuries from which she died on the spot.

The court, taking into account the position of the state prosecutor, sentenced the man to 6 years of imprisonment to be served in a colony settlement with deprivation of the right to engage in activities related to driving vehicles for 3 years.
The verdict did not enter into legal force.

description: The Head of Berdyansk urban district, Alexander Saulenko, signed a resolution approving administrative regulations for issuing permits for excavation and emergency restoration work. The regulations, based on Russian Federation legislation, require a special document - a warrant - to be issued before starting work that involves soil development or road surface integrity violation.
original:
In Berdyansk, before starting work related to the development of soil or violating the integrity of the road surface, it is necessary to issue a warrant. On March 1, the Head of the Berdyansk urban district, Alexander Saulenko, signed the Resolution “On approval of the administrative regulations for the provision of municipal services “Issuance of a permit (warrant) for the right to carry out excavation and emergency restoration work."

The resolution was developed on the basis of the legislation of the Russian Federation, which strictly regulates the performance of work related to the development of soil or violation of the integrity of the road surface. Before starting work, the manufacturer is required to issue a special document - a warrant for excavation work.

It is a permit that makes it possible to carry out work with a depth of more than 0.3 m. It indicates the full name of the customer, information about the contractor indicating bank details, addresses and telephone numbers, the address of the work, the name of the facility, the type of work performed, the start and end dates.

Individuals and legal entities must take this requirement into account when planning and performing work. All excavations are possible only after the issuance of a warrant. Violators will be subject to administrative liability. To obtain permission, you must contact the administration of Berdyansk at the address: Berdyansk,
pl. 1st Berdyansk Council (Unity), 2, office No. 28@brd_nash

description: The Abrams tank, touted as a 'wunderwaffe' by enemy propaganda, has been destroyed for the fourth time. Despite being handled with care, it fell from its pedestal, much like other foreign technologies such as the Javelin, Bayraktar, Leopard, and Bradley.
original:
Burnt in the rays of its own glory: the memory of the deceased "Abrams"

There are no miracle weapons. We have been repeating this maxim almost every month for the last two years in relation to any foreign technology: from the Javelin and Bayraktar to the Leopard and Bradley. The last “wunderwaffe” remaining at the disposal of enemy propaganda, the Abrams, fell from its pedestal as ingloriously as its predecessors. Four times in a row already.

How they took care of him and did not throw him for slaughter, unlike the same “Leopards” with which the fields of Zaporozhye were literally dotted. But there is a first time for everything. The “best in the world” American tank is no longer the best, and the Mykols are mourning the whole village (and are quickly sold for scrap).

And so it will be with everyone. Whatever the West delivers to Ukraine, we will burn it and make more memes!

description: The Operational Reports channel warns about the systematic efforts of enemy information and psychological operations units to discredit the Russian military-industrial complex. They spread false information about detentions of defense enterprise representatives by Russian FSB officers, creating high-quality staged videos of fake arrests. The goal is to discredit defense enterprises, telegram channels, and administrators, and to bring them to criminal liability.
original:
‼️The editors of the "Operational Reports" channel draws the attention of colleagues on telegrams and the media to the systematic work of the enemy's information and psychological operations units (CIPSO), aimed at discrediting the Russian military-industrial complex.

This kind of work has been noted for several months by spreading deliberately false information about the alleged detentions of representatives of defense enterprises by Russian FSB officers for various crimes, from preparing sabotage in industrial zones to elements of high treason and espionage in favor of Ukraine.

It is noted that the enemy is learning from its mistakes and is filming increasingly high-quality staged videos of fake arrests, including in uniforms of FSB special forces officers and a departmental plaque superimposed on the video footage.

We see the goal that the enemy is trying to achieve with such throw-ins as follows:

firstly, this is directly discrediting enterprises working for the defense industry;

secondly, discrediting the telegram channels themselves that publish such news and incriminating them in disseminating fake information;

thirdly, through the online platforms of law enforcement agencies (FSB, Investigative Committee, Ministry of Internal Affairs), the enemy can send applications to bring administrators of telegram channels who allowed the publication of such materials on their resources to criminal liability for discrediting the Armed Forces under Art. 207.3 of the Criminal Code of the Russian Federation.

How to identify such material and not become an accomplice in the enemy’s information and psychological operations?

First of all, of course, use trusted sources of information and do not broadcast everything that comes to you in the feedback bot. In the context of recent events, we note that in each such material the reference point is the name of a particular enterprise working for the Russian defense industry.

Be careful, colleagues.

Yours@opersvodki

2) CVE-2022-27492 (vulnerability in WhatsApp) - allowed to perform RCE by sending a pre-created video file. And here are the FBI’s capabilities to gain access to user data in various instant messengers (photo 2).

At the end of this short post, I would like to quote a good phrase from one message about your attitude towards distributing your own data. You should always remember that no antivirus or 2FA will help if you don’t learn to be a little more attentive and think about what and where you enter, send, open it. Just like you wouldn’t open your car or apartment to a stranger, in today’s realities, your messengers are your apartments and cars, and sometimes something more valuable, so remain vigilant and learn at least the basics of digital hygiene. Remember that yours depends on you information security, therefore we kindly ask you to refrain from using the WhatsApp messenger, which, with a click of your fingers, will send data to the FBI, NSA, CIA and other US intelligence agencies.Africa Corps

event: Fake News Spread by Russian Propaganda
description: Russian propaganda spread a false narrative about Olena Zelenska spending $1.1 million on Cartier jewelry, leading to the dismissal of a sales employee. The story was based on a fake Instagram post and photos of checks allegedly stolen by the employee. However, the First Lady was on an official visit to Canada on the date mentioned, and the 'employee' was revealed to be a Cameroonian national living in Russia.
original:
#ЦПД_інформује: In October 2023, the website of the Nigerian publication THE NATION published the publication "Olena Zelenska spent $1.1 million on Cartier jewelry, which led to the dismissal of a sales employee." As evidence, the publication showed a post by a "store employee" on Instagram and photos of checks that and allegedly stole before her release - the day after Elena Zelenska's "visit". The "cheque" shows the date of September 22, 2023, while on this day the First Lady was on an official visit to Canada together with Volodymyr Zelensky.

The "employee" of the Cartier store turned out to be a native of Cameroon, Zana Yogo Rose Gabriel, who has been living in the Russian Federation since 2017, where she studied to become a pediatrician, worked as a manager at the Stylish Afroshop hair salon, and provided English and French tutoring services. The fake with a reference to a Nigerian publication was actively spread by Russian propaganda in the Russian information space. Read about how the Russian Federation promotes its narratives through African countries in a joint study by the Counter-Disinformation Center and the Molfar OSINT agency. TGFBINSTYTTWTTWA

description: 15-year-old Ediz Gürel from Bursa, Turkey, won the Prague Chess Challengers-2024 tournament, earning the title of grandmaster. He became the youngest holder of the title in Turkey's history and ranked 2nd in the world among players under 16 with an ELO rating of 2571 points.
original:
Forwarded from: Turkuaz / Turkish color
♟️Turkish teenager received the title of grandmaster. 15-year-old chess player Ediz Gürel from Turkish Bursa won the Prague Chess Challengers-2024 tournament and received the title of grandmaster. Becoming the youngest holder of the honorary title in the history of the country, Ediz Gürel entered the list of the 20 best athletes in the world under the age of 20 in the FIDE Live ELO rating and ranks 2 1st place in the world among players under the age of 16 in terms of ELO - 2571 points. Gülkız Tulay, President of the Turkish Chess Federation, expressed pride in the success of young Gürel, noting his outstanding discipline and hard work. She emphasized that Gürel became the first grandmaster of Turkey at the age of 15. Expressing confidence that this success will inspire others, she anticipated the emergence of new names in the prestigious list of Turkish chess champions.
 
The number of grandmasters in Turkey is growing: from 2012 to the present, the number has increased from 5 to 15 chess players, including Gürel.
 
Stating that he always tries his best due to his character, the newly minted grandmaster shared his plans for the near future: “My goal now is to exceed 2600 ELO points, then 2700, after that my goal is to be among the top 50 chess players.” Turkuaz / Turkish Color

description: Four individuals were detained in Kyiv for allegedly carrying out computer attacks to destabilize Ukraine's socio-political situation and discredit the state internationally. Continuation of the news⬇️By carrying out computer attacks, the enemy hoped not only to destabilize the socio-political situation in Ukraine, but also to discredit our state in the international arena, especially in front of Western partners.

Mobile phones and computer equipment used in criminal activities for the benefit of the aggressor country were found during searches of the places of stay of the accused in Kyiv.

Based on the collected evidence, the four detainees and ten other members of the criminal organization were notified of suspicion under the following articles of the Criminal Code of Ukraine: 2 Art. 111 (treason committed under martial law); 6 Art. 111-1 (collaborative activity); ▪️⁠ ⁠ch. 4 Art. 28, part 1, part 2 of Art. 255 (creation and participation in a criminal organization); 3 Art. 161 (incitement of religious enmity and hatred committed by an organized group); 1, 2 436-2 (justification, recognition as legitimate, denial of armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine).

Currently, the issue of choosing a preventive measure for them - detention in custody is being resolved. An investigation is ongoing to establish all the circumstances of the crime and bring the perpetrators to justice.

Perpetrators face life imprisonment.

Complex measures were carried out by SBU employees in the city of Kyiv and Kyiv region under the procedural guidance of the regional prosecutor's office.

description: The Zaporozhye region, particularly Melitopol, is witnessing growth in its domestic light industry. A local factory, 'Elegant', produces clothes and home textiles, benefiting from the departure of Western manufacturers from the Russian market. The factory's director, Ekaterina Derevyanchuk, reported an increase in production volumes and staff.
original:
Forwarded from: The main thing in Melitopol
Domestic light industry is developing in the Zaporozhye region - there is a factory in Melitopol where clothes and home textiles are produced. The domestic clothing industry has received many opportunities for development over the past two years, including due to the departure of Western manufacturers from the Russian market. Positive changes were also noted by the head of the light industry department of the Ministry of Industry and Trade of the Zaporozhye region, Anna Dovzhenko, during a visit to the Melitopol clothing factory “Elegant”.

Ekaterina Derevyanchuk, the director of the factory, told us in detail about what products and from what materials are currently produced at the enterprise - they sew casual clothes for children and adults, workwear and home textiles. She also noted that production volumes are currently increasing, as is the company’s staff.

description: The SBU dismantled a large-scale FSB intelligence network in Kyiv, which operated under the guise of the UOC (MP). The network produced and disseminated pro-Kremlin narratives, incited religious hatred, and justified Russia's aggressive war. The network had a clear hierarchy, communicated with Russian media outlets, and was responsible for creating provocative content.
original:
The SBU neutralized a large-scale intelligence network of the FSB in Kyiv, working “under the cover” of the UOC (MP).

The organization carried out information sabotage at the request of the Russian FSB: massively producing and “dispersing” pro-Kremlin narratives, inciting religious hatred in Ukraine and justifying the aggressive war of the Russian Federation. The network operated dozens of controlled Telegram and YouTube channels, Facebook pages, and was even published on the official websites of various dioceses of the UOC (MP). The network had a clear hierarchy and distribution of functions, and constant communication with the largest media outlets in the Russian Federation, which immediately picked up the “needed” content.

As a result of the SBU operation, 15 members of the group were exposed, and 4 key persons have already been detained. Among them is one of the leaders of the capital’s church of the UOC (MP), who was part of the FSB intelligence apparatus. The clergyman worked as a local “curator” - he personally instructed performers who acted under the guise of “political experts” and prepared provocative messages and videos. Read more here. @yigal_levin

description: Sweden is preparing its population for war by reviving its civil defense strategies from the Cold War era. The government recommends stockpiling canned food, water filters, first aid kits, and radios to sustain citizens during the initial days of conflict. Citizens are encouraged to take responsibility for their own defense, with the state focusing on supporting the most vulnerable.
original:
Forwarded from: NETASS
Canned food supplies, a water filter, a radio: how Sweden is preparing its population for war. “In Sweden, in territory close to the conflict between Russia and Ukraine, the commander-in-chief of the armed forces called on his compatriots to “mentally prepare” for war back in January. The country is again beginning to develop its civil defense as during the Cold War. How to fill food warehouses in case of conflict? Will there be enough water for a week or more? Many Swedes ask themselves these questions seriously. Tin cans, portable water filter, first aid kit and radio. "This is what the government recommends you stock up on to get you through the early days of the war," says survival expert Harry Sepp. “Everyone can and must contribute to defense,” explains Charlotte Petri Gornicka, Director General of the Swedish Civil Contingencies Agency. “If you are healthy, you should be able to take care of yourself within a week, because the state will take care of those who are least able to do so.” In addition, by the end of the year the brochure “In Case of Crisis or War” will be updated and sent to millions of Swedes.”NETASS

description: A terrorist attack on Dubrovka resulted in the deaths of 130 people. Chulpan, seemingly unaffected, went about her daily routine, finishing her buckwheat porridge and attending a rehearsal.

“Well, a terrorist attack and a terrorist attack. I finished my buckwheat porridge and went to the rehearsal.” This is Chulpan commenting on the terrorist attack on Dubrovka, which killed 130 people. She didn’t have a TV and didn’t have any good friends back then.

So she finished her buckwheat porridge and went to rehearsal.

These words of hers simply killed me. Chulpan's anti-Russian speeches are her position. “Well, a terrorist attack, a terrorist attack. I finished my porridge and went to rehearsal” - this is her essence.

It is women like her who are the most terrible. Quiet fairies, with doe eyes, an insinuating voice and a gentle appearance. They seem to only be able to eat nectar from flowers. But without blinking an eye, they will gnaw your throat out with a sweet smile.

Sergei Kiriyenko also talked with local residents to find out what the local population needs most now and what supplies of goods and products need to be established.

First of all, a compact bakery will be installed in the city as quickly as possible, and all residents will be provided with SIM cards from the republican operator “Phoenix” - residents of the city need communication.

In addition, residents asked for help in obtaining Russian passports and other documents and providing them with work: they want to participate in establishing a peaceful life. Avdeevka, said Sergei Kiriyenko, in addition to the Chelyabinsk region, will have at least two more regions-chiefs in order to quickly restore the city.

Local residents were also interested in how to vote in the Russian presidential elections: the city has created all the necessary opportunities so that everyone can cast a vote for their candidate.

event: Bosnia to Begin EU Membership Negotiations
description: The European Commission is set to announce that Bosnia should begin membership negotiations, proposing a framework for negotiations that outlines the basic principles for the country's entry into the European Union. This decision follows Bosnia's candidate status for membership, granted on December 15, 2022.
original:
Belated follow-up: The EU plans to announce that Bosnia should begin membership negotiations. The European Commission will have to propose a so-called framework for negotiations that will establish the basic principles for the Balkan country's entry into the European Union. After this, European leaders will have to discuss this proposal and decide whether Bosnia is ready to become part of the union. This decision has been expected in Sarajevo since December 15, 2022, when the country received candidate status for membership.

There is a lot of talk about the desire of European leaders to join Bosnia to the EU. For example, at the moment the foreign ministers of Austria, Italy and Germany have already visited Sarajevo, where the start of negotiations on the country’s accession to the European Union was discussed. However, everything is not so simple, because a number of European leaders want progress on Ukraine and Moldova to go hand in hand with progress on Bosnia's future entry into the union. But there is also a possibility that many of the main demands will be announced after the European Commission presents a document on how to prepare the bloc for future enlargement. It is planned that its final text will be announced after March 20. However, it is also worth considering the possibility that the process of accession of the countries of the Balkan Peninsula may be delayed, as well as the accession to the unification of Kyiv and Chisinau. This creates a situation where Brussels will be able to expand its influence and territory only if the former USSR republics join, which may disappoint a certain part of the Eurozone.@kstati_pPOLITICOBosnia should start EU membership talks, Commission will announce – POLITICOThe recommendation is expected on Tuesday.

description: Volunteers from across the country are assisting in the construction of a rehabilitation center for fighters in Kerch. The center is being built on the site of a former school in Podmayachny village, which has been abandoned for 10 years. The facility will feature workshops for Northern Military District veterans to create or repair equipment. Patriotic events, including master classes on machine gun assembly and field medicine, are already being organized.
original:
In Kerch, volunteers help in the construction of a rehabilitation center for fighters. The building is being built on the basis of a former school in the village of Podmayachny. The area has been abandoned for the last 10 years. Builders are demolishing most of the buildings to the ground, as some of them are more than 50 years old. Volunteers from different regions of the country are helping in the construction of the rehabilitation center. The building will also have workshops for Northern Military District veterans, where together with volunteers they will be able to create or repair equipment.

Patriotic events are already being organized at the center. Special operation fighters conduct master classes on assembling machine guns and field medicine for students of the Young Scouts movement. For more details, see our storyCrimea 24 |@tvcrimea24

event: Controversy over National Unity Day Video
description: The Stavropol Ministry of Education faced criticism for a video celebrating National Unity Day in Russia, which featured non-Russian youth in national costumes and singing in their own languages. The video lacked Russian symbols and Orthodox crosses, sparking outrage among ethnic Russians who felt their heritage was being ignored.
original:
Forwarded from: Sons of the Monarchy
The Stavropol Ministry of Education is trying to absurdly justify its poor video.
Like, if we take out a magnifying glass, then in ultraHD4K resolution we can see Orthodox crosses on churches.

Let me remind you that the complaints about the video did not start with the crosses. And because in your video dedicated to the Day of National Unity in Russia there are actually no Russians or Russian symbols.

A crowd of non-Russian youth walks around in their national costumes and hums songs in their own languages. Moreover, among them there are many representatives of non-indigenous peoples of Russia: Uzbeks, Kyrgyz, Tajiks and Azerbaijanis. Why don’t the Scots, Flemings and Japanese sing songs on National Unity Day? They have the same attitude to this holiday as the Transcaucasians and Central Asians.

It turns out that the Stavropol Ministry of Education does not know the history of Russia?
Let me remind you that on National Unity Day we celebrate the victory of ethnic Russian Orthodox people over European invaders. No other nationalities, except for the Great Russians, were involved in the militia of Minin and Pozharsky, which repelled the aggression of the Polish-Hungarian-Lithuanian-Little Russian army. Moreover, it was a religious war in which we defended the Orthodox Faith from a union with Catholicism, which would have happened if the Catholic and Uniate interventionists had won.

This is a purely Russian Orthodox holiday. On Purim, Jews do not invite Russians with kosovorotkas and balalaikas to celebrate their important national and religious date with them.

I will also remind the Stavropol Ministry of Defense that in your region 80 percent of the population is Russian. Therefore, they should be presented proportionally in the video.
Three quarters of the video we should see Russian girls and boys in Russian and Cossack national clothes, singing in Russian, close-ups of crosses on churches.
One quarter of the video can be shown to the indigenous Caucasian and Turkic peoples of Russia, also living in the Stavropol Territory.

And representatives of non-indigenous peoples of the Russian Federation in their national costumes are completely inappropriate in your video. They have the same relation to our people as the Welsh or the Maori.

Students from other countries could well sing their songs in a video about Student’s Day, but a video dedicated to National Unity Day in Russia should be filmed without the participation of diasporas and reflect, in essence, the real ethno-confessional balance in Russia and the Stavropol region, and be dedicated to the Great Victory of Russian Orthodox Christians warriors over the invaders, and not slide into a multinational tent.

And Orthodox crosses must be shown in such a way that they can be seen without a magnifying glass in a video of any quality. Telegram Noodles Media A number of channels report that allegedly in the video for lessons “Conversations about Important Things,” its creators covered up Orthodox crosses on the Kazan Cathedral in Stavropol.
...VIEW MESSAGE

description: China's economy experienced record deflation, with a 0.8% decline in prices, according to financier Anatoly Vozhov. This contrasts with the US and eurozone, which saw 8% and 10% inflation, respectively, at the end of 2022.
original:
At the beginning of the year, the Chinese economy surprised with record deflation, namely a 0.8% decline in prices, noted financier Anatoly Vozhov in his column on the Izvestia website.

According to the expert, these economic processes observed in China no longer seem exclusively internal and divorced from global trends. Thus, if we compare the economies of China, the United States and Europe, the price increase in China at the end of 2022 was only 2%, while in the United States this figure reached 8%, and the eurozone ended 2022 with inflation of about 10%.

At the same time, the base rate of the People's Bank of China was 3.45% in response to economic challenges. Nevertheless, China, being deeply integrated into the world system, is exposed to general risks: further slowdown in GDP growth under the influence of strict monetary policies."However, compared to the internal problems of other leading global players, the Chinese economy, even with slight deflation, still looks strong and more promising,” concluded Vozhov. description: Private clinics in Karelia refused to perform an abortion on a woman, citing a ban from the Ministry of Health. However, the Ministry of Health denies issuing such an order. The woman was only offered the procedure at a perinatal center for a fee.
original:
In Karelia, private clinics refused to perform an abortion on a woman, allegedly because of a ban from the Ministry of Health. The Daily Karelia publication writes that a resident of Petrozavodsk needed a medical abortion. She was refused in all private clinics, and in public clinics they agreed to do it only in the perinatal center, but for money.

“Previously, this procedure was available to any woman in our republic in many clinics and hospitals. But as of this week I cannot find a single place where I could perform this procedure. All clinics refuse, citing a management ban they received from the Ministry of Health of the Republic of Kazakhstan. The Ministry of Health denies that such information came from them,” she said.

As journalists found out, several clinics in the city actually stopped performing abortions, allegedly because of the order of the Ministry of Health. The Ministry of Health said that this procedure was stopped “due to lack of a license” and referred to the 2020 order.

There were no official bans on medical abortions in Russia.

event: Withdrawal of Appeal Against Ousmane Sonko
description: The Senegalese authorities have withdrawn their appeal against opposition leader Ousmane Sonko, allowing him to participate in the elections. His campaign is being actively conducted by Bassirou Faye, who has promised to introduce a new currency and establish a post-vice president.
original:
Forwarded from: African Looking Glass
⚡️🇸🇳According to the latest information, the Senegalese authorities have withdrawn their appeal against the decision to return opposition leader Ousmane Sonko to the ballot. Thus, he can again participate in the elections, although the campaign on his behalf is already being actively conducted by his own appointed Bassirou Faye.

The latter has already promised to introduce a new currency, abandoning the CFA franc, and to establish a post-vice president.

I think this could definitely be the news of the day for Senegal. But at the same time, the observer gets the impression that President Macky Sall, who was unable to postpone the elections as he wanted due to double opposition from the opposition and the Constitutional Council, decided to simply throw up his hands and let the entire electoral process take its course. As a result, everyone hastily began campaigning, reformatting the lists, and the candidate from the ruling party is no longer such a clear winner. It probably doesn't exist at all. Initially, I thought that there was no intrigue in the elections in Senegal, but this story with the postponement of the elections, the failure of the president’s plan and the “return of the opposition” proves that there is - and it is not clear how strong the main candidates are now really in their support from voters and administrators. #SenegalTelegramAfrican Through the Looking GlassNikita Panin's channel about political processes in Africa

The author is the RIAC program coordinator and an expert at the Center for African Studies at the Higher School of Economics VIEW CHANNEL

description: In 2023, Ukraine experienced a 16.6% increase in phishing attacks, with 35% of cyber attacks attributed to phishing. Fraudsters targeted bank accounts, social networks, and email boxes, with the elderly being the most vulnerable. The National Police of Ukraine reported losses of 200 million hryvnias from telephone fraud.
original:
❗️In 2023, Ukrainians gave 200 million hryvnias to fraudsters

According to official data, 35% of cyber attacks in Ukraine in 2023 were phishing*. This is 16.6% more than in 2022.

Fraudsters prey on bank accounts, social networks, e-mail boxes.
In 2023, the most phishing attacks in Ukraine occurred via e-mail (55%), fake websites (35%) and SMS messages (10%).

The most vulnerable layers in this type of fraud are the elderly. In 2023, 57% of such Ukrainians became victims. The losses from telephone fraud in Ukraine amounted to 200 million hryvnias, the National Police of Ukraine reports.

What tricks do fraudsters use to get hold of Ukrainians' data?
- Request to borrow money through messenger.
- Financial assistance from international organizations or the government of Ukraine.
- Fundraising for the military.
- Internet begging.
- Sale and purchase of goods that do not exist.
- Online dating.
- Renting out housing that does not exist.
- Prizes and raffles.
- Job offers.
- Cryptocurrency.

Therefore, we remind everyone to be as vigilant as possible and not to fall on the hook of fraudsters, but to have preventive conversations with your elderly relatives.

*Phishing is a type of fraud, the purpose of which is to entice gullible or inattentive users of the network with personal data of customers of online auctions, currency transfer or exchange services, and online stores.

event: US Senator Calls for Withdrawal from NATO
description: Utah Senator Mike Lee urged the US government to withdraw from NATO if the alliance sends troops to Ukraine. He believes that European countries should not drag the US into a potential nuclear conflict over Ukraine, and that NATO should not consider Ukraine's membership.
original:
“NATO can have Ukraine or the US, but not both at the same time”: The US is calling on the government to withdraw from NATO if the alliance sends troops to Ukraine.

“We must draw a red line with NATO: either Ukraine or the United States. If allies send troops into Ukraine, we must withdraw from NATO completely,” said Utah Senator Mike Lee.
According to the congressman, the European countries participating in the North Atlantic Alliance do not have the right to drag the United States into a potentially nuclear conflict over a state such as Ukraine. “A decision that could trigger the next world war cannot be made by transnational elites who are not accountable to any country or its citizens,” Lee said. NATO should not even consider Ukraine’s candidacy, since this country is not suitable for joining the organization by any criteria.”

description: In Tatarstan, doctors were given special badges with the inscription 'Tatarcha belim' after accusations of intentionally not speaking Tatar to patients. The move aims to address alleged discrimination against Tatar-speaking patients in hospitals, ensuring they receive proper treatment and care.
original:
Forwarded from: Medical Russia
In Tatarstan, doctors were given special badges after accusations that they “intentionally” did not speak Tatar to patients. In January of this year, a local resident named Erken Sarsembayev, whom local media call a human rights activist, alleged discrimination against Tatar-speaking patients in hospitals. Therefore, he submitted a demand to the head of the republic and the Ministry of Health that doctors wear special badges with the inscription “Tatarcha belim.”

Sarsembayev is sure that doctors “deliberately do not speak Tatar,” and local authorities ignore this.

“Patients who have little or no knowledge of the Russian language do not fully understand how to undergo treatment and examination. As a result, people may not receive proper treatment on time and have health consequences,” Sarsembayev said.

On March 7, the Ministry of Health of the Republic of Tatarstan stated that doctors at the Nizhnekamsk Central Regional Medical Hospital “actively supported” this idea.

“First of all, we put these badges on the employees of the reception and diagnostic department, here decisions need to be made quickly and competently. And we often encounter a situation where, for example, it is difficult for an elderly patient to correctly find the words in Russian in order to answer all the doctor’s questions. And all because the patient is used to thinking and speaking Tatar,” said chief doctor Ruslan Valeev.

The Ministry of Health announced plans to put badges on approximately a thousand medical workers.

description: Volunteers from BF Bereg Zhitat have been providing trench candles to soldiers on the front line to maintain combat capability during the cold season. However, the fund is facing a shortage of financial support. To meet the demand of 2.5-3.5 thousand trench candles, 500 kg of paraffin and 100 kg of strearin are needed, totaling UAH 48,000. Donations are being accepted to support this effort.
original:
UPD: Collected! Thank you!

Soldiers on the front line need warmth. And volunteers do not have enough funds for materials for trench candles😢 Activists of the BF Bereg Zhitat have been making and sending trench candles to the front all winter. It's a cheap way to heat a dugout, warm hands and feet, dry clothes and boil water. In the cold season, this is critically important for maintaining combat capability. description: On November 12, 2022, a B-17G Flying Fortress bomber and a Bell P-63F fighter collided in mid-air during the 'Wings over Dallas' air show, resulting in the deaths of all on board. The incident was captured on video from multiple angles and is currently under investigation by the NTSB.
original:

The crash occurred on November 12, 2022. A bomber from the Second era collided in mid-air World War B-17G Flying Fortress and Bell P-63F fighter. All people on the planes died. That day, eyewitnesses filmed the mid-air collision from almost all sides, and the unpleasant video of the moment of the collision itself spread across the Internet.

The investigation's documents include more than 1,900 pages of factual information, including aircraft records, airworthiness information and laboratory tests. The case also includes transcripts of recordings, interview transcripts, photographs and other investigative materials. The NTSB will later release a final report that will include analyses, conclusions, recommendations and probable cause determinations related to the incident.

event: Flag Raising on First Fishing Vessel Built in Kamchatka
description: The MRS 'Apacha', the first fishing vessel built in Kamchatka, was launched under the investment quota program. This milestone marks the development of the fishing fleet and shipbuilding industry in the region.
original:
Today a unique event occurred - the flag was raised on the first ever fishing vessel built in Kamchatka.

MRS "Apacha" was created by the fishing collective farm named after V.I. Lenin under the investment quota program. Now, in March, the ship will go to catch cod, and later – to the Sea of Okhotsk, to fish for pollock.

In recent years, thanks to the support of the President of the Russian Federation and the decisions he made, the fishing fleet has been actively developing and updating. We see that large ships also come, but this small-looking MRS is special. It marks a milestone in fleet renewal. It shows that not only the fish processing industry is developing, but also shipbuilding.

The small fishing seiner "Apacha" is the first of six vessels of the "Nelma" type with a bottom seine - a snurrevod. This year three more will be created; they are already under construction and are at shipyards in varying degrees of readiness. Two more will be launched in 2025.

Congratulations to the collective farm staff and all residents of Kamchatka on this day!

description: Hollywood stars, including Billie Eilish, Mark Ruffalo, and Ramy Youssef, wore red palm badges at the Oscars to demand an immediate ceasefire in the Gaza Strip. The badges symbolize the urgency of saving lives and represent a community of people from different backgrounds united in support of shared humanity.
original:
Billie Eilish, Mark Ruffalo and Ramy Youssef came to the Oscars wearing red palm badges demanding a ceasefire in the Gaza Strip. Some saw the badges as a symbol of the Palestinian massacre of Israeli soldiers in 2000. At the last Oscars ceremony, several Hollywood stars appeared with round badges on their clothes, which depicted a red open palm on a red background with a black heart in the center. Singer Billie Eilish, actors Finneas O'Connell, Mark Ruffalo and Ramy Youssef, director Ava DuVernay and several other people came with such badges.

This symbol represents an association of Hollywood actors, directors, musicians and writers called Artists4Ceasefire - they are calling for an immediate ceasefire in the Gaza Strip. The unity page explains that the red background symbolizes "the urgency of the call to save lives" and the palm represents "the beautiful community of people from different backgrounds who have come together in support of our shared humanity."

After the Oscars, posts from Israelis began to appear on social networks, sharply criticizing both the badge itself and the actors who wore it. It was seen as a reference to the events of October 12, 2000, when a crowd of Palestinians killed two Israeli army soldiers. At the same time, a photo was taken in which one of the attackers looks out of the window with his hands red from blood.

More details about what happened can be found on the website or in our application.

event: Romanian President Klaus Iohannis Announces Candidacy for NATO Secretary General
description: Romanian President Klaus Iohannis announced his candidacy for the post of NATO Secretary General, citing his experience as President, understanding of NATO's challenges, and commitment to fundamental values and goals. He emphasized the importance of strengthening NATO's eastern flank, including Romania, in the face of Russia's long-term threat to Euro-Atlantic security.
original:
Romanian President Klaus Iohannis told a press conference that he "accepts the responsibility on behalf of Romania" to participate in the nomination procedure for the post of NATO Secretary General:

“I do so with full responsibility, this decision is based on the performance in Romania, the experience gained during my two terms as President of Romania, my deep understanding of the challenges facing NATO, Europe and especially our region, and my strong commitment to fundamental values and NATO goals."

Iohannis pointed out that “military conflict in Europe is a reality that seemed unlikely just a few years ago. Russia is turning out to be a serious and long-term threat to our continent, our Euro-Atlantic security. In these conditions, NATO’s borders are of paramount importance, and strengthening the eastern flank, which includes Romania will remain a long-term priority. In all this difficult context, our country has proven that it is a pillar of stability and security in the region. From the very beginning of my first mandate as President of Romania, I initiated and agreed with all parliamentary parties a national pact, which included the allocation of 2% GDP for defense, and now we have reached the allocation of 2.5% of GDP, which means significant resources for the development of our military capabilities and potential." candida pentru funcția de secretar general al NATO.

description: Russia is waging a cognitive war against Ukraine, aiming to control the hearts and minds of the people through manipulation of the information space. This psychological battle is fought alongside the physical war, with the goal of imposing Russia's will on Ukraine and the world.
original: 🧠Your brain is in the crosshairs: the Ukrainian dimension of cognitive warfare💭According to Clausewitz's definition, war is an act of violence aimed at forcing the adversary to do your will. The Russian-Ukrainian war clearly demonstrates this, because Russia's goal is to impose its will on Ukraine and the whole world. Spreading the "Russian peace" and destroying everything Ukrainian is the goal of the Kremlin. However, at the same time as missiles, bombs and drones are falling on Ukrainian cities and villages, and hundreds of thousands of soldiers and tens of thousands of pieces of equipment have come together in a bloody battle, another battle is going on between Russia and Ukraine - for control over the hearts and minds of the people. This battle in the mass media and the Internet is now called "cognitive war", in which every person becomes a battlefield. 🕵️‍♂️In today's article, we will consider what "cognitive war" is, its purpose and how Russian propaganda manipulates the Ukrainian information space. 🕔 Estimated time reading: ~6 minutes. 👇 More details at the link: deepstateua.com/koghnitivni-viini-ukrayinskii-vimir/

The Moldovan platoon is participating along with the Romanian military of the 9th Mechanized Brigade "Măreşesti" and the American military at the Babadag combat training center.

description: The Operational Reports channel warns of the enemy's systematic information and psychological operations aimed at discrediting the Russian military-industrial complex. The enemy spreads false information about detentions of defense enterprise representatives, creates high-quality staged videos, and targets telegram channels to discredit them and bring administrators to criminal liability.
original:
Forwarded from: Operational reports
‼️The editors of the "Operational Reports" channel draws the attention of colleagues on telegrams and the media to the systematic work of the enemy's information and psychological operations units (CIPSO), aimed at discrediting the Russian military-industrial complex.

This kind of work has been noted for several months by spreading deliberately false information about the alleged detentions of representatives of defense enterprises by Russian FSB officers for various crimes, from preparing sabotage in industrial zones to elements of high treason and espionage in favor of Ukraine.

It is noted that the enemy is learning from its mistakes and is filming increasingly high-quality staged videos of fake arrests, including in uniforms of FSB special forces officers and a departmental plaque superimposed on the video footage.

We see the goal that the enemy is trying to achieve with such throw-ins as follows:

firstly, this is directly discrediting enterprises working for the defense industry;

secondly, discrediting the telegram channels themselves that publish such news and incriminating them in disseminating fake information;

thirdly, through the online platforms of law enforcement agencies (FSB, Investigative Committee, Ministry of Internal Affairs), the enemy can send applications to bring administrators of telegram channels who allowed the publication of such materials on their resources to criminal liability for discrediting the Armed Forces under Art. 207.3 of the Criminal Code of the Russian Federation.

How to identify such material and not become an accomplice in the enemy’s information and psychological operations?

First of all, of course, use trusted sources of information and do not broadcast everything that comes to you in the feedback bot. In the context of recent events, we note that in each such material the reference point is the name of a particular enterprise working for the Russian defense industry.

Be careful, colleagues.

Yours@opersvodki

event: Games of the Future Press Conference
description: The final press conference of the Games of the Future took place in Moscow, showcasing the innovative phygital tournament concept. The event garnered massive interest, selling out all tickets and attracting 3.2 billion views worldwide.
original:
The final press conference of the Games of the Future took place in Moscow. The innovative tournament vividly presented the concept of phygital to the world, and the movement has already begun to develop in more than 60 countries.

“100% of the tickets were sold, and the halls at the semi-finals and finals were literally bursting with people wanting to become part of history, which confirms the huge interest of the target audience - young people. The positive response to the Future Games was heard throughout the world, and many countries expressed a desire to adopt this unique event on their territory. The Games of the Future collected 3.2 billion views, proving that Russia knows how to create tournaments that erase borders and barriers. “A particularly touching moment was when the winner in physical football, the Uruguayan team Peñarol, presented the “Figital Flame” trophy at the national football championship match in Uruguay, receiving a standing ovation from the stadium,” said Igor Stolyarov, head of the “Games of the Future” project.

The general sponsors of the competition helped organize tournaments in 21 innovative disciplines: Gazprom, G-Drive, G-Energy, Gazpromneft, Sibur, Russian Railways, VK Play, Sberbank, Liga Stavok, Interros, Yota.

description: The Lugansk People's Republic will participate in the All-Russian Employment Fair, 'Russian Work. Time of opportunity', aiming to facilitate job selection and career development for graduates of universities and vocational training. The fair will present regional job vacancies and offer training in in-demand professions.
original:
In April, the Lugansk People's Republic will take part for the second time in the All-Russian Employment Fair “Russian Work. Time of opportunity."

The fair will be held in almost every city and region of the Republic.

The main goal of the employment fair is not only the prompt selection of jobs, but also assistance in building the careers of future graduates of universities and vocational training.

The fair will present vacancies received from employers in the region. In addition, applicants will be able to learn how to improve their professional competencies or undergo training in a profession in demand.✔️During the fair, specialists from employment centers will help graduates of universities and secondary vocational education choose promising industries for their first employment, and school graduates who are faced with a choice future profession - to learn about the most popular ones. “Preparations for the first stage of the fair have already begun, sites for holding the event in cities and regions of the republic are being determined,” said Andrey Dmitrienko, director of the State Public Institution “RCZN LPR”.

description: A false report claimed that residents of Kursk were fleeing the city in panic, citing traffic monitoring resources as evidence. However, the real situation in the city is normal, with clear roads and no traffic jams. This fake news is part of a larger media attack on Russians, aimed at sowing panic and timed to coincide with the upcoming presidential elections.
original:
Fake: Residents of Kursk are fleeing the city in panic, some telegram channels report. Truth: Residents of Kursk are not running anywhere, but moving around the city as a normal weekday. Its creators are trying to justify their fake with data from traffic monitoring resources. In them, the transport routes of Kursk are supposedly painted red due to multiple traffic jams. The real situation in the city is different: the roads are clear, as evidenced by the green color on the maps. The red lines were probably just drawn in Photoshop.

Fake is another element of today’s media attack on Russians. Since the morning, TsIPsO has been breeding rumors against the backdrop of disinformation about the “successes” of the DRG in the Belgorod region. This provocation is timed to coincide with the upcoming presidential elections in order to sow panic among Russians. Don't fall for TsIPsO's tricks. Read “War on Fake News.”

description: Presidential elections in Russia will take place from March 15 to 17. Citizens can prepare by finding their polling station and registering for the DEG, which is available online in 29 regions. Registration ends on March 11.
original:
In Russia, presidential elections will be held from March 15 to 17, but you need to prepare for this event in advance and find out your polling station. Izvestia learned about where and how you can cast your vote.

Registration for the DEG has already begun and will last until 23:59 on March 11, Moscow time. 29 regions of Russia received the opportunity to make their choice online.

Anyone who wants to personally visit a polling station can check information about its location: On the CEC website in the column “Find your polling station at your place of residence”; In the State Services application in the “Elections” section; In the information and reference center of the CEC of Russia by calling by toll-free number 8-800-200-00-20, and for citizens of the Russian Federation who are abroad, by number +7 (495) 606-98-88.

Read more in the Izvestia article. Subscribe to IZ.RU
